mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDER_NUM AS orderNum, o.ADMIN_CHECKED AS adminChecked, DATE_FORMAT(o.ORDER_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS orderDate, o.ORDER_ADDRESS AS orderAddress, d.ORDER_QUANTITY AS orderQuantity, d.PRODUCT_NUM AS productNum, p.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, (p.PRODUCT_PRICE*d.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS totalPrice, m.MEMBER_EMAIL AS memberEmail FROM BB_ORDER o LEFT JOIN BB_ORDER_DETAIL d ON o.ORDER_NUM = d.ORDER_NUM LEFT JOIN BB_PRODUCT p ON d.PRODUCT_NUM = p.PRODUCT_NUM JOIN BB_MEMBER m ON o.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM ORDER BY ADMIN_CHECKED, o.ORDER_NUM DESC

SELECT O.MEMBER_NUM AS memberNum, OD.PRODUCT_NUM AS prductNum, PD.PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, O.ORDER_NUM AS orderNum, O.ORDER_DATE AS orderDate, OD.ORDER_QUANTITY AS orderQuantity, (PD.PRODUCT_PRICE * OD.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS totalPrice FROM BB_ORDER O JOIN BB_ORDER_DETAIL OD ON O.ORDER_NUM = OD.ORDER_NUM JOIN BB_PRODUCT PD ON OD.PRODUCT_NUM = PD.PRODUCT_NUM WHERE O.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum};
